attributes.action: Sack Edd Balls for his comments during the budget.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During the budget when cameron highlighted how much the honest decent hardworking people will be worse off, Edd Balls said, and I quote "SO WHAT!".
This to me shows how much this government thinks of us decent normal hardworking people.

I am disgusted!.
